mapper.insert: insert into announcement_tb values(default, #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update announcement_tb set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_date = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, user_id as userId, title, content, register_date as registerDate, update_date as updateDate from announcement_tb where id = #{id}
select id, user_id as userId, title, content, register_date as registerDate, update_date as updateDate from announcement_tb order by registerDate
select id, user_id as userId, title, content, register_date as registerDate, update_date as updateDate from announcement_tb order by registerDate limit 0, #{limit}
